summary: The misadventures of a ragtag group of elderly Home Guard local defense volunteers at the onset of WW2.
cast: Arthur Lowe|John Le Mesurier|Clive Dunn|John Laurie|James Beck|Arnold Ridley|Ian Lavender|Liz Fraser|Bernard Archard|Derek Newark|Bill Pertwee|Frank Williams|Edward Sinclair|Anthony Sagar|Pat Coombs|Roger Maxwell|Paul Dawkins|Sam Kydd|Michael Knowles|Fred Griffiths|John Baskcomb|George Roubicek|Scott Fredericks|Ingo Mogendorf|Franz Van Norde|John Henderson|Harriet Rhys|Dervis Ward|Robert Raglan|John D. Collins|Alan Haines|Desmond Cullum-Jones|Colin Bean|Frank Godfrey|Freddie Wiles|Freddie White|Leslie Noyes|David Fennell|Hugh Hastings|George Hancock|Bernard Severn|Alvar Liddell|George Curtis|Anthony Eden|Jason James|Pat Judge|Maureen Nelson|Reg Thomason|Fred Wood
title: Dad's Army
